paragraph: Top Shot features the photo with the most votes from the previous day’s Daily Dozen, 12 photos selected by the Your Shot editors. The photo our community has voted as their favorite is showcased on the @natgeoyourshot Instagram account. Click here to vote for tomorrow’s Top Shot.Your Shot photographer Tony V. made this up close portrait of a vulture. Your Shot Associate Photo Editor Kristen McNicholas writes, “I love Ivan’s comment: ‘This is one of the best and most interesting vulture portraits I have seen in a long time. Love the crystal clear eyes, love the curiosity I feel when I look at this image. Fantastic bird shot and to take a fantastic bird shot is not easy even though many may think it is…’ I couldn’t agree more and I love having the opportunity to see this bird more up close and personal. Great job!” Photograph by Tony V.Top Shot features the photo with the most votes from the previous day’s Daily Dozen, 12 photos selected by the Your Shot editors.
